#summary SocialConnect implementation example.

= Introduction =

[http://yasn.socialconnect.in Yet Another Social Network (YASN)] is a simple social platform using SocialConnect to communicate with Facebook and OpenSocial. It's packaged with SocialConnect and presented as a example of what SocialConnect can add to a social platform.

= Features =
YASN is a very simple platform but that perform basic tasks of any social platform. On YASN, users can create an account and a profile. They also can write small stories and comment them. 

SocialConnect give YASN's users a quick way to fill their profile or find friends on the platform. They can retrieve them from Facebook or an OpenSocial platform very quickly.
